title: Import WIKIMEDIA images
user_story:
As an API contributor\
I want to import WIKIMEDIA images via their ID\
So I don't have to fill out all fields manually
description:
# **Request**

* method: `POST`
* URL path: `/images` 
* properties:
  * `image_provider`: string “wikimedia“, mandatory
  * `external_id`: string, mandatory

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (201)
* a JSON with the meta information, the user data and the imported data:
  * `id`: integer
  * `external_id`: string
  * `image_provider`: string “wikimedia“
  * `name`: string
  * `description`: string/null
  * `creator`: string
  * `license`: string
  * `tags`: string/null
  * `source`: string
  * `image_url_original`: string
  * `image_url_xxl`: string/null
  * `image_url_xl`: string/null
  * `image_url_l`: string/null
  * `image_url_m`: string/null
  * `image_url_s`: string/null
  * `image_url_xs`: string/null
  * `created_at`: string
  * `updated_at`: string

**Unhappy path**

* negative HTTP status code (400, 422)
* a plain text response stating the problem

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business Logic)**

* the node is successfully created when provided with valid data 
* when the request is malformed then code 400 is returned (incl. error message in plain text) → already covered by <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCA-75>
  <!-- media: file 8951c3fe-d48f-4c56-993e-a297a5c87337 -->
  * when mandatory fields are missing
  * when wrong data types were submitted
* when a wikimedia image with the given ID could not be found → 422
* unknown properties are ignored (no error, no warning) → already covered by <https://dennis-gerike.atlassian.net/browse/MCA-75>
  <!-- media: file 2874b4fb-2704-4bac-9e42-78c38b59ff47 -->
* the nodes are filled with the data returned from the wikimedia API
  * empty values are returned as `null`

# **Quality Gates**

* Unit+Integration tests (Jest) are extended (100% coverage)
* Behavior tests (Cucumber) are added (100% coverage)
* OpenAPI spec is extended
  * schema is still valid
* Bruno collection is extended
* Performance tests are extended
  * tests are still green

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* full validation
* bulk create
* versioning information
* auth / security
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
